WELCOME_MODAL.TITLE: Welcome to Beanly!
WELCOME_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: From cozy corners perfect for reading to stylish spots for your next coffee date — explore places that feel just right for you.

FIND_CAFES.TITLE: Find cafés by city
FIND_CAFES.DESCRIPTION: Explore handpicked coffee spots across different cities — filter by vibe, amenities, or purpose.

SAVE_FAVORITES.TITLE: Save favorite places
SAVE_FAVORITES.DESCRIPTION: Create your personal list of go-to cafés, from cozy corners to quick espresso stops.

COLLECT_ACHIEVEMENTS.TITLE: Collect achievements
COLLECT_ACHIEVEMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Check in, leave reviews, share photos — and unlock badges along your coffee journey.
